title: Centric Premium Ceramic Replacement Rear Disc Brake Pad Set for Select Lexus and Toyota Model Years (301.06060)
features: SUPER PREMIUM GRADE: Centric Parts is one of the largest North American aftermarket suppliers of brake parts for passenger vehicles, light, medium and heavy-duty trucks, commercial vehicles, racing and high-performance vehicles.

SUPERIOR POWER: Centric Brake Pads provide superior stopping power and reliability for passenger cars and light duty trucks. The compounds produce little brake dust and provide longer service than other brake pad formulas.

QUIET STOPPING: Centric Parts engineers have worked with leading brake pad manufacturers to develop two application specific friction compounds that combine improved stopping performance and reduced noise under braking.

EASY INSTALLATION: Centric Brake Pads are installation ready with High Performance Shims attached and feature O.E. style gas slots and chamfers to optimize braking performance especially in repeat stop situations.

VEHICLE APPLICATIONS: 2023-2010 Lexus GX460, 2023-2003 Toyota 4Runner, 2014-2007 Toyota FJ Cruiser, 2009-2003 Lexus GX470, 2007-2001 Toyota Sequoia, 1997-1996 Lexus LX450, 1997-1993 Toyota Land Cruiser
description: Centric Parts is a leading manufacturer and supplier of aftermarket brake components for passenger vehicles, medium duty trucks, and fleet vehicles. Designed with the professional technician in mind, Centricâ€™s product range of brake pads, rotors, calipers and hydraulics are built to fit every budget. Our award-winning catalog covers the widest range of applications in the industry eliminating the need to mix brands when servicing vehicles.
